name: CPU Load
description: Checks 1-minute load average. Warns if load exceeds 2x CPU cores.
check_cmd: CORES=$(nproc 2>/dev/null || echo 4); LOAD=$(awk '{print int($1)}' /proc/loadavg); THRESHOLD=$((CORES * 2)); if [ $LOAD -lt $THRESHOLD ]; then echo "$LOAD"; else echo "$LOAD"; fi
fix_cmd: echo '⚠️ High CPU load detected'; echo 'Top CPU consumers:'; ps -eo pid,comm,%cpu --sort=-%cpu | head -10; echo 'Load average:'; uptime
